org.andengine.engine

Class LimitedFPSEngine

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.andengine.engine.Engine
      • org.andengine.engine.LimitedFPSEngine
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ITouchEventCallback

    public class LimitedFPSEngine
extends Engine
    A subclass of Engine that tries to achieve a specific amount of updates per second. When the time since the last update is bigger long the steplength, additional updates are executed. (c) 2010 Nicolas Gramlich (c) 2011 Zynga Inc.
    Since:
    10:17:47 - 02.08.2010
    Author:
    Nicolas Gramlich
